title: Extrovert or Introvert?
question_text:
A group of $1200$ men and $900$ women were asked to identify whether they were "more of an extrovert" or "more of an introvert". The results are shown in the graph below.
Assuming everyone who was surveyed responded, and based on the graph, which of the following conclusions can be reached?

choices.text: The number of men who said "more of an extrovert" is greater than the number of women who said "more of an extrovert".
The percentage of women who said "more of an introvert" is greater than the percentage of men who said "more of an extrovert".
Women are more evenly split between the two personality types than are men.

Approximately
46
men and
57
women said "more of an extrovert".
There is no association between gender and personality type.
